name: Out of Phase
description:
Entry for the 3rd Game Maker's Toolkit Game Jam

Theme: Only One

Out of Phase is a bullet hell shooter themed around controlling direction and managing health. Enemies can only hit you if you are travelling along the same line as they are. You have a single Bomb charge that clears a region around you, and can be recharged by taking damage.

An incomplete list of Only Ones in Out of Phase:

  • Only One Screen
  • Only One Button
  • Only One Ammo
  • Only One Direction-You-Take-Damage-In

Disclaimer: This is a Jam game, and as such it is Not At All Polished in terms of enemy placements and balance.

This game is basically a prototype to show off the mechanics.

Have fun!
